title: March 2025 Minutes
text: Discussion covered budget adjustments, downtown parking, broadband expansion timing, and a grant request for river cleanup. Action items included zoning review and Main Street signage.

title: January 2025 Minutes
text: Agenda items included the budget review, fire district equipment, downtown parking study, and a grant application for the community center. Updates covered the water system upgrade, library expansion, volunteer program, zoning map, and river cleanup.

title: November 2024 Minutes
text: Reviewed ordinance updates, winter road plan, and library renovation planning. Approved a grant match for the community center and reviewed Pine Street traffic calming options.

title: August 2024 Minutes
text: Summer events recap included parks maintenance, water system bids, sidewalk repairs, and a broadband survey. Staff shared an update on Main Street lighting and the community garden expansion.

title: April 2024 Minutes
text: Project updates covered Main Street streetscape, sidewalk repairs, broadband study, and a small business grant. Notes include park improvements, wildfire mitigation, emergency plan revisions, and cemetery records digitization.

title: October 2023 Minutes
text: Approvals included Ordinance 2023-10, parks maintenance, and a community events permit. Discussion covered housing needs, annexation, trailhead signage, tourism outreach, and traffic safety on Pine Street.

title: June 2023 Minutes
text: Midyear budget check-in covered reserve targets and a zoning variance request. Updates included wildfire mitigation, Main Street facade program, and grant reporting.

title: February 2023 Minutes
text: Reviewed capital plan items, a river cleanup contract, cemetery records scanning, and volunteer training schedules. The board approved a grant application for trailhead improvements.

title: December 2022 Minutes
text: Annual audit results were presented alongside Ordinance 2022-07 updates. Staff discussed storm drainage improvements, a broadband grant application, and winter operations planning.

title: May 2022 Minutes
text: Parks upgrades and a broadband pilot were reviewed alongside sidewalk repair on Pine Street. The board discussed downtown safety and a seasonal hiring plan.

title: September 2021 Minutes
text: Road resurfacing bids, water system upgrade timelines, and the housing study kickoff were reviewed. Staff shared a zoning map update and grant reporting status.

title: March 2021 Minutes
text: Budget workshop notes included community events permits, trailhead signage, and annexation discussion. The board reviewed Main Street maintenance priorities.

title: July 2020 Minutes
text: Emergency plan revisions were adopted alongside library expansion planning. Updates included Main Street streetscape, grant timelines, and volunteer coordination.

title: April 2019 Minutes
text: Discussion covered the downtown parking study, tourism outreach plans, and community center repairs. Staff noted a broadband feasibility report and grant opportunities.

title: November 2018 Minutes
text: Fire district equipment needs, a small business grant, and a river cleanup volunteer day were discussed. The board reviewed zoning outreach and Main Street maintenance.
